create_table_query:
CREATE TABLE address_types (
    code TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE "addresses" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	normalized_address VARCHAR NOT NULL UNIQUE, 
	street VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	street_2 VARCHAR DEFAULT NULL, 
	city VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	state VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	postal_code VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	country VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	raw_data TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE "assertions" (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 
    company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
    title VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
    description VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
    link VARCHAR,
    FOREIGN KEY(company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number)
)

CREATE TABLE "attributes" (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL,                       -- Associated company number (ForeignKey)
  name VARCHAR NOT NULL,                                 -- Name of the attribute
  value VARCHAR NOT NULL,                                -- Value of the attribute
  FOREIGN KEY (company_number) REFERENCES companies(company_number) 
    ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION,               -- Explicitly set cascading options
  UNIQUE (company_number, name, value)
)

CREATE TABLE "classifications" (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  classification VARCHAR UNIQUE                          -- Unique classification
)

CREATE TABLE "companies" (
  company_number TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,                                  -- Unique identifier for a company
  company_name TEXT,                                                    -- Name of the company
  status TEXT DEFAULT NULL,                                             -- Current status of the company
  jurisdiction TEXT,                                                    -- Jurisdiction name or code
  jurisdiction_id INTEGER,                                              -- Identifier for the jurisdiction (ForeignKey)
  incorporation_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (                          -- Date of incorporation
    incorporation_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'),
  company_type TEXT DEFAULT NULL,                                       -- Type of company
  registered_address TEXT DEFAULT NULL,                                 -- Registered address of the company
  agent_name TEXT DEFAULT NULL,                                         -- Name of the registered agent
  agent_address TEXT DEFAULT NULL,                                      -- Address of the registered agent
  parent_company_name TEXT DEFAULT NULL,                                -- Name of the parent company
  parent_company_url TEXT DEFAULT NULL,                                 -- URL of the parent company
  PRIMARY KEY (company_number),                                         -- Primary key
  FOREIGN KEY (jurisdiction_id) REFERENCES jurisdiction(id) 
    ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE                                 -- Explicitly set cascading options
)

CREATE TABLE "company_addresses" (
  company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL,                       -- Associated company number (ForeignKey)
  address_id INTEGER NOT NULL,                           -- Address ID (ForeignKey)
  type TEXT REFERENCES address_types(code) DEFAULT NULL, -- Type of address
  start_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (
    start_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'
  ),                                                     -- Start date of the address
  end_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (
    end_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'
  ),                                                     -- End date of the address
  PRIMARY KEY (company_number, address_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (company_number) REFERENCES companies(company_number) 
    ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION,               -- Explicitly set cascading options
  FOREIGN KEY (address_id) REFERENCES addresses(id) 
    ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION                -- Explicitly set cascading options
)

CREATE TABLE "company_akas" (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL,                       -- Associated company number (ForeignKey)
  aka VARCHAR NOT NULL,                                  -- AKA (alias)
  start_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (
    start_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'
  ),                                                     -- Start date
  end_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (
    end_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'
  ),                                                     -- End date
  type VARCHAR(12) DEFAULT NULL CHECK (
    type IN ('trading', 'abbreviation', 'legal', 'published', 'dba', 'aka', 'alias')
  ),                                                     -- Type of AKA
  language VARCHAR(2) DEFAULT 'en',                      -- Language of the AKA
  FOREIGN KEY (company_number) REFERENCES companies(company_number) 
    ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION                -- Explicitly set cascading options
)

CREATE TABLE "company_industry_codes" (
  company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL,                       -- Associated company number (ForeignKey)
  industry_code_id INTEGER NOT NULL,                     -- Industry code ID (ForeignKey)
  statement_link VARCHAR,                                -- Link to the statement
  PRIMARY KEY (company_number, industry_code_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (company_number) REFERENCES companies(company_number) 
    ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION,               -- Explicitly set cascading options
  FOREIGN KEY (industry_code_id) REFERENCES industry_codes(id) 
    ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION                -- Explicitly set cascading options
)

CREATE TABLE "company_officers" (
	company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	officer_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
	role TEXT REFERENCES role_types(code) DEFAULT NULL,
	start_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (start_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'),
    end_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (end_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'), 
	PRIMARY KEY (company_number, officer_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number), 
	FOREIGN KEY(officer_id) REFERENCES officers (id)
)

CREATE TABLE "company_people" (
	company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	person_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
	role TEXT REFERENCES role_types(code) DEFAULT NULL,
	start_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (start_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'),
    end_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (end_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'), 
	PRIMARY KEY (company_number, person_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number), 
	FOREIGN KEY(person_id) REFERENCES people (id)
)

CREATE TABLE "control_mechanisms" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	mechanism TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE control_statement_mechanisms (
	control_statement_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	mechanism_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	PRIMARY KEY (control_statement_id, mechanism_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(control_statement_id) REFERENCES control_statements (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(mechanism_id) REFERENCES control_mechanisms (id)
)

CREATE TABLE "control_statements" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 
	company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	controlled_company_name VARCHAR, 
	controlled_company_number VARCHAR, 
	controlled_company_jurisdiction VARCHAR, 
	controlling_company_name VARCHAR, 
	controlling_company_number VARCHAR, 
	controlling_company_jurisdiction VARCHAR, 
	start_date VARCHAR DEFAULT NULL, 
	end_date VARCHAR DEFAULT NULL, 
	mechanisms TEXT, 
	statement_link VARCHAR, 
	raw_data TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY(company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number), 
	FOREIGN KEY(controlled_company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number), 
	FOREIGN KEY(controlled_company_jurisdiction) REFERENCES jurisdiction (code), 
	FOREIGN KEY(controlling_company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number), 
	FOREIGN KEY(controlling_company_jurisdiction) REFERENCES jurisdiction (code)
)

CREATE TABLE "events" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 
	company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	start_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (start_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'),
    end_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (end_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'), 
	description VARCHAR, 
	link VARCHAR,
	FOREIGN KEY(company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number)
)

CREATE TABLE "filings" (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 
	company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	date VARCHAR, 
	description VARCHAR, 
	link VARCHAR,
	FOREIGN KEY(company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number)
)

CREATE TABLE "gazette_notices" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL,
	date VARCHAR,  
	link TEXT,
	publication_id INTEGER, 
	notice TEXT,
	classification_id INTEGER, 
	FOREIGN KEY(company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number), 
	FOREIGN KEY(publication_id) REFERENCES publications (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(classification_id) REFERENCES classifications (id)
)

CREATE TABLE "identifier_delegate" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 
	company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	identifier_system VARCHAR DEFAULT NULL, 
	identifier VARCHAR DEFAULT NULL, 
	categories VARCHAR DEFAULT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY(company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number)
)

CREATE TABLE "industry_codes" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 
	code VARCHAR, 
	description VARCHAR, 
	code_scheme VARCHAR,
	UNIQUE (code)
)

CREATE TABLE "jurisdiction" (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  code VARCHAR UNIQUE,                                  -- Unique code for the jurisdiction
  name VARCHAR,                                         -- Name of the jurisdiction
  country VARCHAR,                                      -- Country of the jurisdiction
  full_name VARCHAR,                                    -- Full name of the jurisdiction
  state_abv VARCHAR,                                    -- State abbreviation
  county VARCHAR,                                       -- County name
  city VARCHAR,                                         -- City name
  longitude FLOAT,                                      -- Longitude coordinate
  latitude FLOAT,                                       -- Latitude coordinate
  zip_code VARCHAR,                                     -- Zip code
  area_code VARCHAR,                                    -- Area code
  parent_jurisdiction INTEGER,                          -- Parent jurisdiction (ForeignKey)
  FOREIGN KEY (parent_jurisdiction) REFERENCES jurisdiction(id)
    ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE                -- Explicitly set cascading options
)

CREATE TABLE "lei_address" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	lei VARCHAR, 
	address_type VARCHAR, 
	language VARCHAR, 
	address_lines TEXT, 
	city VARCHAR, 
	region VARCHAR, 
	country VARCHAR, 
	postal_code VARCHAR, 
	FOREIGN KEY(lei) REFERENCES lei_data (lei)
)

CREATE TABLE "lei_data" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	lei VARCHAR, 
	status VARCHAR, 
	creation_date VARCHAR, 
	registered_as VARCHAR, 
	jurisdiction_id INTEGER, 
	category VARCHAR, 
	legal_form_id VARCHAR, 
	legal_form_other VARCHAR, 
	associated_lei VARCHAR, 
	associated_name VARCHAR, 
	expiration_date VARCHAR, 
	expiration_reason VARCHAR, 
	successor_lei VARCHAR, 
	successor_name VARCHAR, 
	sub_category VARCHAR, 
	UNIQUE (lei), 
	FOREIGN KEY(jurisdiction_id) REFERENCES jurisdiction (id)
)

CREATE TABLE "lei_entities" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	lei VARCHAR, 
	entity_name VARCHAR, 
	country VARCHAR, 
	entity_type VARCHAR,
	FOREIGN KEY(lei) REFERENCES lei_records (lei)
)

CREATE TABLE "lei_entity" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	lei VARCHAR, 
	legal_name VARCHAR, 
	language VARCHAR, 
	FOREIGN KEY(lei) REFERENCES lei_data (lei)
)

CREATE TABLE "lei_links" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	lei VARCHAR, 
	self_link VARCHAR, 
	managing_lou_link VARCHAR, 
	lei_issuer_link VARCHAR, 
	field_modifications_link VARCHAR, 
	direct_parent_link VARCHAR, 
	ultimate_parent_link VARCHAR, 
	direct_children_link VARCHAR, 
	ultimate_children_link VARCHAR,
	FOREIGN KEY(lei) REFERENCES lei_data (lei)
)

CREATE TABLE lei_records (
	lei VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	entity_legal_name VARCHAR, 
	registration_status VARCHAR, 
	entity_status VARCHAR, 
	jurisdiction_id INTEGER, 
	registered_address VARCHAR, 
	headquarters_address VARCHAR, 
	registration_date VARCHAR, 
	next_renewal_date VARCHAR, 
	managing_lou VARCHAR, 
	validated_at VARCHAR, 
	PRIMARY KEY (lei), 
	FOREIGN KEY(jurisdiction_id) REFERENCES jurisdiction (id)
)

CREATE TABLE "lei_registration" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	lei VARCHAR, 
	initial_registration_date VARCHAR, 
	last_update_date VARCHAR, 
	status VARCHAR, 
	next_renewal_date VARCHAR, 
	managing_lou VARCHAR, 
	corroboration_level VARCHAR, 
	validated_at_id VARCHAR, 
	validated_as VARCHAR, 
	FOREIGN KEY(lei) REFERENCES lei_data (lei)
)

CREATE TABLE "lei_relationships" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	lei VARCHAR, 
	relationship_type VARCHAR, 
	related_link VARCHAR, 
	FOREIGN KEY(lei) REFERENCES lei_data (lei)
)

CREATE TABLE links (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 
	company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	link VARCHAR NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY(company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number)
)

CREATE TABLE "mergers" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 
	company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	merged_company_name VARCHAR, 
	merged_company_id VARCHAR, 
	surviving_company_name VARCHAR, 
	surviving_company_id VARCHAR, 
	jurisdiction_id INTEGER, 
	statement_link VARCHAR, 
	start_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (start_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'),
    end_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (end_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'), 
	raw_data TEXT, 
	FOREIGN KEY(company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number), 
	FOREIGN KEY(merged_company_id) REFERENCES companies (company_number), 
	FOREIGN KEY(surviving_company_id) REFERENCES companies (company_number), 
	FOREIGN KEY(jurisdiction_id) REFERENCES jurisdiction (id)
)

CREATE TABLE "officer_addresses" (
  officer_id INTEGER REFERENCES officers(id) 
    ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION,               -- Explicitly set cascading options
  address_id INTEGER REFERENCES addresses(id) 
    ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION,               -- Explicitly set cascading options
  type TEXT REFERENCES address_types(code) 
    ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE NO ACTION,              -- Explicitly set cascading options
  start_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (
    start_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'
  ),                                                     -- Start date
  end_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (
    end_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'
  ),                                                     -- End date
  PRIMARY KEY (officer_id, address_id)
)

CREATE TABLE "officers" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	occurrence_number VARCHAR, 
	name VARCHAR, 
	status VARCHAR, 
	link VARCHAR, 
	address VARCHAR, 
	start_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (start_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'),
    end_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (end_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'),  
	FOREIGN KEY(company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number)
)

CREATE TABLE "people" (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    full_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    raw_data TEXT NOT NULL,
    GivenName TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
    MiddleName TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
    Surname TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
    PrefixMarital TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
    PrefixOther TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
    FirstInitial TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
    MiddleInitial TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
    LastInitial TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
    SuffixGenerational TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
    SuffixOther TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
    Nickname TEXT DEFAULT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE "people_addresses" (
	person_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	address_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
	type TEXT REFERENCES address_types(code) DEFAULT NULL,
	start_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (start_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'),
    end_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (end_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'), 
	PRIMARY KEY (person_id, address_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(person_id) REFERENCES people (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(address_id) REFERENCES addresses (id)
)

CREATE TABLE "person_akas" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,  
	person_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	aka VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	start_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (start_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'),
    end_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (end_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'), 
	type VARCHAR(12) DEFAULT NULL CHECK(type IN ('trading', 'abbreviation', 'legal', 'published', 'dba', 'aka', 'alias')),
	language VARCHAR(2) DEFAULT 'en', 
	FOREIGN KEY(person_id) REFERENCES people (id)
)

CREATE TABLE "person_officers" (
	person_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	officer_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
	role TEXT REFERENCES role_types(code) DEFAULT NULL,
	start_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (start_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'),
    end_date DATE DEFAULT NULL CHECK (end_date GLOB '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]'), 
    PRIMARY KEY (person_id, officer_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(person_id) REFERENCES people (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(officer_id) REFERENCES officers (id)
)

CREATE TABLE "publications" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	name VARCHAR, 
	company_number VARCHAR,
	UNIQUE (name), 
	FOREIGN KEY(company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number)
)

CREATE TABLE "related_relationships" (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  company_number VARCHAR,                                -- Associated company number (ForeignKey)
  related_company VARCHAR,                               -- Name of the related company
  related_company_id VARCHAR,                            -- Related company ID (ForeignKey)
  jurisdiction_code VARCHAR,                             -- Jurisdiction code
  status VARCHAR,                                        -- Status of the relationship
  type VARCHAR,                                          -- Type of relationship
  link VARCHAR,                                          -- Link related to the relationship
  start_date VARCHAR DEFAULT NULL,                       -- Start date of the relationship
  end_date VARCHAR DEFAULT NULL,                         -- End date of the relationship
  statement_link VARCHAR,                                -- Statement link
  FOREIGN KEY (company_number) REFERENCES companies(company_number) 
    ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION,             -- Explicitly set cascading options
  FOREIGN KEY (related_company_id) REFERENCES companies(company_number) 
    ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION,             -- Explicitly set cascading options
  FOREIGN KEY (jurisdiction_code) REFERENCES jurisdiction(code) 
    ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION              -- Explicitly set cascading options
)

CREATE TABLE role_types (
    code TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE "share_parcel" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	shareholder_id_person INTEGER, 
	shareholder_id_company VARCHAR, 
	shareholder VARCHAR, 
	number_of_shares VARCHAR, 
	voting_percentage VARCHAR,
	FOREIGN KEY(company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number), 
	FOREIGN KEY(shareholder_id_person) REFERENCES people (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(shareholder_id_company) REFERENCES companies (company_number)
)

CREATE TABLE "subsidiary_relationships" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 
	company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	subsidiary_company VARCHAR, 
	subsidiary_company_id VARCHAR, 
	jurisdiction_code VARCHAR, 
	status VARCHAR, 
	type VARCHAR, 
	link VARCHAR, 
	start_date VARCHAR, 
	end_date VARCHAR DEFAULT NULL, 
	statement_link VARCHAR, 
	FOREIGN KEY(company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number), 
	FOREIGN KEY(subsidiary_company_id) REFERENCES companies (company_number), 
	FOREIGN KEY(jurisdiction_code) REFERENCES jurisdiction (code)
)

CREATE TABLE "total_shares" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	company_number VARCHAR, 
	number INTEGER, 
	share_class VARCHAR,
	FOREIGN KEY(company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number)
)

CREATE TABLE "trademark_registrations" (
	id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 
	company_number VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	trademark VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	registration_date VARCHAR, 
	status VARCHAR, 
	FOREIGN KEY(company_number) REFERENCES companies (company_number)
)
